issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

automatic.name: Headings; Wrong Order, Empty & Missing Headings;

issues.title: Heading levels should only increase by one
issues.description: Ensure the order of headings is semantically correct

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Heading order invalid

issues.title: Heading elements are not in a sequentially-descending order
issues.description: Properly ordered headings that do not skip levels convey the semantic structure of the page, making it easier to navigate and understand when using assistive technologies. [Learn more about heading order](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/heading-order).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Heading order invalid

issues.title: Document should have one main landmark
issues.description: Ensure the document has a main landmark

all.message: Document does not have a main landmark

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Document does not have a main landmark

issues.title: All page content should be contained by landmarks
issues.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks

any.message: Some page content is not contained by landmarks

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (147.6px by 18px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 19px instead of at least 24px.
